body_html:
@Sergei-Lebedev , thank you, I specified 10.0 instead of CUDA 10.0 and it went through.
I did see a warning though on my ubuntu:

Auto-Configuration Warning: 'TMP' environment variable is not set, using 'C:\Windows\Temp' as default
my bazel command was:
bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
I need to find how to fix the TMP env variable issue.

body:
@Sergei-Lebedev , thank you, I specified 10.0 instead of CUDA 10.0 and it went through.
I did see a warning though on my ubuntu:

`Auto-Configuration Warning: 'TMP' environment variable is not set, using 'C:\Windows\Temp' as default`
my bazel command was:
`bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`
I need to find how to fix the TMP env variable issue.
